content.question: Which of the following best summarizes the authorâ€™s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: The heat produced by power plants often attracts congregations of marine life such as jellyfish.
Many disruptions that are attributed to human activity are actually triggered by natural causes.
Expanding populations of jellyfish are causing increasing problems in many parts of the world.
Predation by jellyfish poses a significant threat to commercial fisheries worldwide.

content.answer: Expanding populations of jellyfish are causing increasing problems in many parts of the world.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
